message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm confident you'll find this a worthwhile investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me at this price?
